revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Olimex |model=A20-OLinuXino-Lime |revision=Rev.E |price=45 |est_release_date=July 2014 |manuf_country=Bulgaria |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |flags=HDMI 1.4a, Micro SD Card slot, LiPo battery connector, GPIO |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A20 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646D-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1;,,, 16-Kbit I²C-Compatible (2-Wire) Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C16BN;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;3;,,, 1.2A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8008C;;2;,,, 2A, 1MHz Step Up Regulator;Silergy;SY7208;;1;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2019.04 |stock_os=Linux;4.19.5 |tp_firmware=Debian, Armbian, Arch Linux (Arm), |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=1234 }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/A20/A20-OLinuXino-LIME/open-source-hardware Product page]
''"A10-OLinuXino-Lime Rev.E"'' is silkscreened on the board :(below the GPIO-2 connector). {{see also|Allwinner|List of Single-board computers}}
*[https://linux-sunxi.org/Olimex_A20-OLinuXino-Lime ''Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime'' on '''Linux-SunXi'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/07/09/olimex-a20-olinuxino-lime-development-board/ ''33 Euros Olimex A20-OLinuXino-LIME Open Source Hardware Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv7/allwinner/a20-olinuxino-lime ''A20 OlinuXino Lime'' on '''archlinux|ARM''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A20 (Dual core ARM Cortex-A7) @1 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400'' MP2 *Memory: 512MB (DDR3@480MHz) SDRAM *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 3x USB 2.0, 1x SATA
===See also=== :;[https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/open-source-hardware ''Olimex'' Products] • [http://linux-sunxi.org/Category:Community_Devices ''Olimex'' Devices] *[[Olimex OLinuXino-MAXI]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-MICRO]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-MINI]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-NANO]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) *[[Olimex A10-OLinuXino-Lime]] *[[Olimex A10s-OLinuXino-Micro]] *[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino]] :[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino-Micro]] :[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino WIFI]] *[[Olimex A13-SOM]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime]] :[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime2]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Micro]] :[[Olimex A20 MICRO 8GB]] *[[Olimex A20-SOM]] :[[Olimex A20-SOM204]] *[[Olimex A33-OLinuXino]] *[[Olimex A64-OLinuXino-1G]] *[[Olimex AM3352-SOM-EVB]] *[[Olimex ARM-USB-TINY-H]]
